name: GetPlayerInterior
description: Retrieves the player's current interior. A list of currently known interiors with their positions can be found on this page.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player to get the interior ID of.

return_values: The interior ID the player is currently in
related_fn:
SetPlayerInterior: Set a player's interior.
 GetPlayerVirtualWorld: Check what virtual world a player is in.
